title: Landing Page for a Burger Shop
description:
Designed and developed a landing page for a Burger Shop who wants to display their product details on the landing page.
The client wants a minimal design with a BIG image of a burger on the top, so I displayed a big burger image on the top inside an egg-shaped vessel.
Also displayed their products under the products section and created a wonderful gallery of images under the photos section.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the landing page
Client's testimonials section with hover effect
Bold amazing footer with contact form above

title: Custom designed personal portfolio
description:
Here is a sample of my work that I designed and developed for a college student. 
I designed a personal portfolio that mentioned about her, education history, skills, social links, every projects that she made, and more. 
Also, designed a contact with a map integration, and developed a contact form that sent all the entered details to her telegram account with a minimal simple footer. 
Her demanded for a minimal design with slike pink shades includes dark theme, so here is the portfolio I designed for her.

projectImages.title: Hero section of the portfolio website
Client's social media and project section
Minimal Footer section with map & contact form
